channel.title: Linux on Isaac Changhau
channel.description: Recent content in Linux on Isaac Changhau

item.title: Useful Tricks for Operating Mac OS and Linux (Ubuntu)
item.description: Useful commands and tricks to raise efficiency under Mac OS and Linux, keep updating! Mac OS Tricks Terminal Themes and VIM Follow this GitHub repository to build your own powerful and colorful Terminal: [color-theme-link], [vimrc-link] Generate New SSH-Key and Add to GitHub Please refer the link (based on Mac OS platform): Generating a new SSH key and adding it to the ssh-agent. Working with SSH key passphrases. Adding a new SSH key to your GitHub account.
